1. PQCDTB - "Property Name" entity: "PQCDTB"

4. J SC - "Property Name" entity: "J SC" (short for "Short Circuit Current")
5. FF - "Property Name" entity: "FF" (short for "Fill Factor")

Sure, here are the relevant "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

2. PC71BM - "Property Name" entity: "PC71BM" (Material Property)

The other entities in the paragraph (e.g. "V OC", "J SC", "FF") do not refer to material properties, so they are not included in the list of relevant entities.
